page.title: 18FAIR OAK COMMUNITY ASSN.
page.content: The Community Association was formed in 1976 with the aim of providing a Community Centre for the village, and the first organised event was a Silver Jubilee parade and fete in 1977. A year later the first carnival since 1959 was organised and the following year this was extended to a full week of events including a Country Fair,Sports Day,barbecue,pram race,disco etc. In 1981 a Horse Show was introduced. The Association is also responsible for the annual firework display,barn dances,film shows, Halloween parties and many other events which improve the entertainment amenities in the village. The Association ,besides its main aim has also, over the years, striven to maintain a close village spirit in the face of ever increasing expansion.
